name: Grand Avenue Medical, Inc.
description: Grand Avenue Medical, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative healthcare solutions, specializing in telemedicine and digital health services. Founded in 2015, the company focuses on enhancing patient access to quality medical care through advanced technological platforms. Grand Avenue Medical offers a comprehensive suite of services including virtual consultations, remote patient monitoring, and a user-friendly mobile application that connects patients with healthcare professionals. The company aims to improve healthcare delivery by leveraging technology to reduce wait times, increase convenience, and provide personalized care. With a commitment to patient-centered services, Grand Avenue Medical is dedicated to improving health outcomes and empowering patients to take charge of their health. The company partners with various healthcare providers and organizations to expand its reach and enhance its service offerings. As a pioneer in the telehealth industry, Grand Avenue Medical is well-positioned to address the growing demand for remote healthcare services, especially in the wake of the global pandemic. The company is also actively involved in research and development to innovate new solutions that further integrate technology into healthcare, making it more accessible and efficient for everyone.

seo.meta_title: Grand Avenue Medical, Inc. | Innovative Telemedicine Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Grand Avenue Medical, Inc., a leader in telemedicine and digital health services. Discover how we enhance patient care through technology.

faq.question: What services does Grand Avenue Medical offer?
faq.answer: Grand Avenue Medical offers telemedicine services, including virtual consultations and remote patient monitoring.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Grand Avenue Medical?
faq.answer: Dr. Sarah Johnson is the CEO of Grand Avenue Medical, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Grand Avenue Medical headquartered?
faq.answer: Grand Avenue Medical is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: How can I access Grand Avenue Medical's services?
faq.answer: You can access our services through our mobile app and website for virtual consultations and health monitoring.

faq.question: When was Grand Avenue Medical founded?
faq.answer: Grand Avenue Medical was founded in 2015.
